unnormalised: Firstly, understanding the athlete's physiology is crucial. A cricketer preparing for the Ranji Trophy will require a drastically different regimen than a badminton player aiming for the All England Open. This involves assessments of strength, speed, agility, and endurance, often using techniques honed at the Netaji Subhas National Institute of Sports.
